document_data.name: Citronella
document_data.mainbody: '''Citronella''' was an aromatic plant [[oil]] used in rituals and medical treatments.
document_data.Availability: [[Aurora's Emporium]] sold citronella for 7 [[sp]] per {{SI|1|lb}}, meant for [[priest]]s to use as an aromatic ritual reagent. Insect-repelling citronella [[candle]]s were also sold there for 3 [[gp]] per dozen.
document_data.Usage:
Citronella oil could be used to make candles that acted as an insect repellent, similar to oil of [[pennyroyal]].{{Cite dragon/207/Trifling Treasures|34}} It could also mask odors and scents to avoid being tracked, by scattering the pungent oil about.{{Cite dragon/69/Ready for anything!|34}}

Citronella oil could be used to make magical candles whose flame could imbue [[arrow]]s with ''[[flame arrow]]''.{{Cite dragon/179/Magic by Candlelight|19}} A certain magically-imbued oil of citronella could be used to temporarily improve the user's personal charisma and magnetism.{{Cite dragon/33/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Magical Oils|47}}
